siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Fiddy is a weekly leaderboard of the best new Indie Hacker side projects. Like, comment on, or share the best projects you find, or submit your own to compete every week.
blogPost.body: Fiddy is a weekly leaderboard of the best new Indie Hacker side projects. Like, comment on, or share the best projects you find, or submit your own to compete every week.
blogPost.title: Fiddy 2.0 - A weekly leaderboard of the best new side projects
blogPost.author: Hessel Dijkstra

localize.description: Fiddy是最好的新独立黑客辅助项目的每周排行榜。喜欢、评论或分享你找到的最好的项目，或者每周提交你自己的项目参加竞争。
localize.tagline: 每周一次的最佳新辅助项目排行榜

localize.description: Fiddy是最好的新獨立黑客輔助項目的每週排行榜。喜歡、評論或分享你找到的最好的項目，或者每週提交你自己的項目參加競爭。
localize.tagline: 每週一次的最佳新輔助項目排行榜

previous.excerpt: Exhausted with endless Zoom Meetings? Grapevine allows you to get asynchronous (one-way) video updates from your team each morning. Short one-way video updates help keep remote and local teams connected without having to schedule or attend in-person meetings.
previous.title: Grapevine 2.0 - Schedule fewer zoom meetings with one-way video updates

localize.description: 被没完没了的变速会搞得筋疲力尽？Grapevine允许您每天早上从您的团队获取异步(单向)视频更新。简短的单向视频更新可帮助远程和本地团队保持联系，而无需安排或参加面对面会议。
localize.tagline: 通过单向视频更新安排更少的缩放会议

localize.description: 被沒完沒了的變速會搞得筋疲力盡？Grapevine允許您每天早上從您的團隊獲取異步(單向)視頻更新。簡短的單向視頻更新可幫助遠程和本地團隊保持聯繫，而無需安排或參加面對面會議。
localize.tagline: 通過單向視頻更新安排更少的縮放會議

next.excerpt: To get somewhere in life, business, study, relationships or anything else, it's important to get guidance from a mentor. But finding the right mentor is difficult. Mentspot provides a simple way to get connected with Mentors and Mentees in any category.
next.title: MentSpot - Find a mentor or become one for free

localize.description: 要想在生活、商业、学习、人际关系或任何其他方面有所成就，得到导师的指导是很重要的。但是很难找到合适的导师。MentSpot提供了一种与任何类别的导师和学员联系的简单方式。
localize.tagline: 寻找导师或免费成为导师

localize.description: 要想在生活、商業、學習、人際關係或任何其他方面有所成就，得到導師的指導是很重要的。但是很難找到合適的導師。MentSpot提供了一種與任何類別的導師和學員聯繫的簡單方式。
localize.tagline: 尋找導師或免費成爲導師
